introduceMsg: Since 2018, the Genome Expo has been held every year to predict genome research trends, commercialization of genomic research, and industrialization direction with the aim of 'populating genome information and genome industry'. Now Ulsan will take a leap forward and hold the Genome·Bio Expo that encompasses the entire genome-based bio-health industry. It will be a place to share the achievements of Ulsan 10,000 human genomes project, the trend of the bio-health industry, and the genome-based future industries. In addition, you can see products and services related to genome, bio, and healthcare at a glance, and various events such as lectures to citizens and questions and answers to genome reports are prepared.
speaker: Speaker
secondCareer: An associate professor at Tokyo Medical and Dental University
thirdCareer: Professor Visiting Pasteur Institute in Paris
fifthCareer: University of Bristol Bachelor of Mathematics and Physics
ulsanExhibition: ULSAN EXHIBITION & CONVENTION CENTER A1 Hall
clinomicsIntro: Clinomics is a leading company in genome-based cancer/disease early diagnosis, and seeks cancer early diagnosis and disease and aging conquest through liquid biopsy and multi-omics technology.
clinomicsIntroSecond: Based on the world's best genome-based bio-health information processing capabilities, it is a company that provides periodic genome-based cancer early diagnosis services through technology that simultaneously detects CTC and cfDNA in blood and multi-omics analysis technology.
enterPriseTypeText: Small and medium-sized enterprises listed on KOSDAQ

privacyText: Users and legal representatives can view or modify the personal information of registered children or children under the age of 14 at any time, and contact the person in charge of personal information management in writing, by phone or e-mail and we will delete it without delay.
privacyTextSecond: If you request correction for errors in your personal information, we will not use or provide such personal information until the correction is completed. In addition, if you request corrections for errors in your personal information, we will not use or provide them until you have corrected them.
